samples.description: This is a sample that can load Samsung Avatar. Two types of animation are supported: Humanoid and Generic.
This is a sample that improves performance according to camera distance by applying Avatar's Material LOD.
This is a sample that displays a pre-loaded dummy Avatar while the Avatar is loading.
This is a sample of creating and combining Multi Avatars through the Mesh Combiner included in the Avatar Plugin. Check out the various options.
This is a FaceTracking Sample that works on Android devices. There is a FaceTracking On/Off function and an Avatar application On/Off function.
Will Be Supported - This is a sample that can load an Avatar created in Galaxy using a fileprovider
